For the purpose of liquidity modelling and determining available liquid financial resources, LMEC does not include the following:
-The liquidation of any reverse repo investment collateral with counterparts included in the cover 2 ($2.039bn as at 31/03/2016 in 5 day stress, $2.005bn in 1 day cover 2 stress)
-term reverse repo (with investment counterparts outside of cover 2), ($1.1bn as at 31/03/2016 in 5 day stress and $2.2 in 1 day stress). Per LMEC Liquidity modelling, reverse repo will be considered as a liquid financial resource on the day of maturity;
-The liquidation of non-cash margin collateral from members included in the cover 2 ($0 as at 31/03/2016 for 1 day test, $425.65mn for 5 day test)
